description:
Finally, the beloved children's classic "Whack-A-Mole" is available on your tablet!

Easy to learn but impossible to master, Mole Mania pits you against an ever-growing army of moles hellbent on capturing your garden. Whacking a mole and eliminating him from the playing field is as simple as touching him on your screen, but when the difficulty ramps up -- more holes, smaller targets, faster enemies -- things get hectic right quick. How long can YOU maintain control?

Kill time at work or school, dazzle your friends, cure up to six different forms of cancer... all this and more is possible through the magic of Mole Mania. So, what are you waiting for? This is it. The time is now. Download Mole Mania today and become the man and/or woman you've always dreamed of becoming! I'm on a horse.
